A4.text: the Kingdom of Belgium has three official languages: Dutch, French, and German

A5.text: Deutschsprachige Gemeinschaft, the official site of the German-speaking Community in Belgium

A6.text: Dutch is one of the three national and state languages of Belgium, together with French and German.
